statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // .cwd'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); if [[ "$cwd" == "$HOME"* ]]; then dir="~${cwd#$HOME}"; else dir="$cwd"; fi; if git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); git_info=" ($branch)"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[1;32m%s@%s\033[0m:\033[1;34m%s\033[0m%s" "$user" "$host" "$dir" "$git_info"
